channel.title: RSPS C++ winterlove
channel.description:
RSPS C++ winterlove base
Credits
pk fubway Moparscape4Lifez
Features
- Got rid of playerlist rebuilding every update.. was retarded (should reduce some lag if any) - Fixed the addItem/deleteItem bug.. it was because some person who built it into winterlove server didn't know difference between packets and real items. Aka removed (itemId+1) just itemId now - Fixed wear command (well it wasn't broken had the (item+1) missing from packets and it used strings if(itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("shield")) was removed.. now it uses constants. - A few mini fix's which saves 50+ bytes in some cases loadInventory()/sendInventoryItem(int slot) - Added loading and multi-threaded saving system to stop any delay possible. - Added remove item from wearing packet - Added 1 person per IP able to login system. - Started adding a npc system.. (Copy pasted PlayerHandler/Player renamed to NpcHandler/Npc) - Finished adding a npc system - Found a nice little add-on for npc system.. figured why not let NPCS level up as well? xD.. (will be togglable) (npc levels won't change those are clientside, but npc's will get stronger and back to weak when server restarts) - Got a few commands working - Added loaders. Autospawn/npclist/item bonuses/items stackable&noteable
Commands
::serverspeed ###
(this changes the whole server's processing speed default is set to 500.
Lowering it can create a speedhack effect and lag more.)
::hats 1 or 0 (1=ON/0=OFF)
(this was to test out movement path it drops fake party hats under your legs to see where you are going)
::kick playerName
(kicks player of server)
::yell message
(yells globally to all players.. it has a anti-spam throttle which makes it a unique design.
the process speed of your server is the limit of how much messages could be sent at a time
default is 500.. meaning 2 yells per second from all players combined.. so some yells
might not pass which is a good thing no one likes abusing yells)
chatting is similar but it is not combined every player gets to send 2 per second.
:ass NewPassword
(change the password of your character)
:os
(Displays important debugging information about your posistion)
:ickup 995 9999999
(As you all know the pickup command.. that will add nearly 10 million of gold item)
::tele 3254 3420
(As you all know this command as well.. it will teleport your character to absolute coordinates 3254,3420).
::empty
(deletes all inventory items).
Compiler Downloads
MinGW Package - http://sourceforge.net/project/showf...?group_id=2435
Visual MinGW (You must have MinGW to use it) - http://visual-mingw.sourceforge.net/ (click downloads)
Visual MinGW is not needed only if you want debugging purposes.
Just MinGW Package is needed.. There is a little compiler.bat (batch file) for the use of MinGW package.
Download Link -
http://www.mediafire.com/?nzm4linuzzl
pictures coming soon ~ pk fubway

[/quote]

…because using C++ is really going to help with the current state of most servers…[/quote]
They would ruin the language like they did to Java. And, of course, the smart ones, would make a server with npc spawning, object spawning, etc, and then, 30,000 people would “leech” the server and call it theirs like they did with delta and credit people “25% C++MANIAC - 175% ME”
